casebody.data:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Karl W. CARTER, Jr. No. D-2739. Supreme Court of the United States Nov. 4, 2013.

Karl W. Carter, Jr., of Alexandria, Virginia, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
